price: 51. Mpe soki tolingaki, mbele totindaki na mboka inso mokebisi.
arabic: وَلَوۡ شِئۡنَا لَبَعَثۡنَا فِي كُلِّ قَرۡيَةٖ نَّذِيرٗا

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: walaw shi'nā labaʿathnā fī kulli qaryatin nadhīran
